ChunkText: cpt approval is granted per semester if a position continues to the next semester, students will need to request cpt again for the next term. students are eligible to start working from the date they are approved by isss. isss cannot approve cpt for dates that have passed. please plan ahead and apply early!
ContextBefore: students cannot legally work off-campus in the US without active cpt approval. students working without proper authorization can lose their immigration status. students should plan ahead and contact our office if they have any questions or concerns. students must have an offer letter for a paid position that is directly related to their degree program.
ContextAfter: students must have cpt approval before beginning work. cpt start and end dates are based on the umbc academic calendar. isss cannot approve dates earlier than the day after the last day of class for that specific term. students are expected to attend the last day of class and finish all their coursework before beginning work for the next term.
